title: Logistics Route Calculator
vehicle_1_info: Pallet size: 1200x800 mm. Space in the vehicle: 160x100x120 cm. Suitable for small deliveries. Vehicle features: Loading is only possible from the rear. The vehicle has no ramp height. The vehicle does not have a lifting platform.
vehicle_2_info: Space in the vehicle: 3.84 m¬≤. The vehicle can carry 3.7x150x170 cm. Suitable for small deliveries. Vehicle features: Loading is only possible from the rear.
vehicle_3_info: Optimal for medium batches. The vehicle can carry 480x220x230 cm. Total area: 9.6 m¬≤. Vehicle features: Side and rear loading possible. The vehicle has no ramp height. The vehicle has an additional lifting platform and pallet jack.
vehicle_4_info: Ideal for large loads. Maximum vehicle space: 14.4 m¬≤ (610x245x250 cm) up to 2150 kg. Vehicle features: Side, rear, and top loading possible. The vehicle has ramp height. The vehicle has an additional lifting platform and pallet jack.
vehicle_1_option_2: Additional distance: 2 EUR/km (91-200 km), 1.50 EUR/km (201-500 km)

footer_item_text: <company_name>Seto Logistic</company_name> is a representative logistics operator providing a full range of services in the sphere of customs cargo and transportation worldwide.

seto_logistic_description: Seto logistic Group is a representative logistics operator providing full range of service in the sphere of customs clearance transportation worldwide for any cargo
best_transport_services: We pride ourselves on providing the best transport and shipping services available all over the world. Our skilled personnel, utilising the latest communications, tracking and combined with experience through integrated supply chain solutions!
quality_description: Following the quality of our service thus having gained trust of our many clients.
reliability_description: We provide with cargo safety throughout all the stages of our delivery process.
contact_description: Get in touch with us if you have any questions about SETO LOGISTIC's express delivery tasks. We are happy to answer all your questions before and after ordering, as well as any inquiries regarding our services.
